name: 2nd International Conference on Business, Management and Leadership
content: Conference Overview: The 2nd International Conference on Business, Management, and Leadership invites scholars, researchers, and professionals to Manchester, United Kingdom, from 26 â€“ 28 February 2025\. This prestigious event will focus on the latest advancements and research in business, management, and leadership. Conference Topics: The conference will cover a broad range of topics including, but not limited to: Strategic Management Agile Leadership Organizational Behavior Innovation Marketing Finance Human Resource Management Sustainable Business Practices And many more. Submission and Review Process: All submitted abstracts will undergo a rigorous review process conducted by our Scientific Committee to ensure the highest standards of academic excellence and relevance. This process guarantees the inclusion of impactful and original research in the conference program. Presentation Formats: To cater to various preferences and facilitate diverse methods of knowledge sharing, the conference offers the following presentation formats: Virtual Presentations: Allowing researchers to present their work remotely. Oral Presentations: Providing a platform for detailed and interactive presentations. Poster Presentations: Enabling visual and interactive engagement with research. Publication Opportunities: Accepted papers will have the opportunity to be published in esteemed journals and conference proceedings, enhancing the visibility and impact of the research presented. Additional Benefits: Invitation Letter: Participants attending in person will receive a complimentary invitation letter to assist with visa applications. City Tour: Enjoy a free guided tour of Manchester, offering an opportunity to explore the local culture and landmarks. We look forward to welcoming you to Manchester for an enriching and inspiring conference experience.
